attributes.action: Introduce a law that limits the amount of profit a private transport company can make, thus reducing the cost of public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For several years now, the cost of public transport has been slowly creeping up, and is beginning to spiral out of control.  A large proportion of the cost of public transport is going straight into the owners’/shareholders’ pocket.  This seems unfair when we consider that public transport is a basic necessity and that in some areas of transport, particular companies have a monopoly, and can charge, seemingly, whatever they want.
